Army Day of DPRK Marked in Vietnam
articles.content:
Army Day of DPRK Marked in Vietnam 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Defence of Vietnam, the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam and the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Club sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on the occasion of the 74th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Radical Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Called for
Film Show on Constitution Day of Poland
articles.content:
Film Show on Constitution Day of Poland 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The Korea-Poland Friendship Association hosted a film show at the Chollima House of Culture on May 3 on the occasion of the Constitution Day of Poland.
 Present on invitation were Polish Ambassador to the DPRK Roman Iwaszkiewicz and embassy officials.    
 Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, members of the friendship association and others were on hand.
 The participants watched a Polish feature film.

S. Korean Military Authorities' Spread of Sheer Misinformation about North Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Authorities' Spread of Sheer Misinformation about North Denounced 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "government information sources" were recently reported to have provided media with sheer misinformation that the warships of the navy of the north side engaged in maneuvers have pledged themselves to "retaliate against the naval force of the south side" on its guard duty "when an appropriate opportunity presents itself." 
 A spokesman for the Navy Command of the Korean People's Army, answering a question raised by KCNA on May 3 as regards the south Korean military authorities' smear campaign against the north, termed such invectives an intolerable insult and a blatant provocation against it.    
 The north side faithful to the noble idea of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration has always remained true to the agreement reached at the inter-Korean general-level talks to prevent any accidental clash on the West Sea. It is now directing special efforts to preventing the occurrence of undesirable incidents in the current blue crab catching season in particular.    
 The fiction of the north's "retaliation" floated by the south Korean military despite this hard fact only betrays its sinister intention to do harm to the north.
 The north side is greatly angered by the south Korean military's false propaganda  as it echoed just what the U.S. imperialist warhawks uttered, dancing to their tune. 
 Through such smear campaign the south Korean military authorities disclosed the undeniable fact that they are following the road of treachery at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists, not the road indicated by the joint declaration.
 The north considers the south Korean military's spread of such misinformation as a prelude to a fresh West Sea skirmish.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
Struggle for Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Declared
articles.content:
Struggle for Withdrawal of U.S. Forces Declared 
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Student Councils reportedly released a statement on April 27 to denounce the U.S ambassador in Seoul for his visit to the cemetery of martyrs of the May 18 Resistance in Mangwoldong. It declared a struggle to expel the U.S. ambassador, who has trampled upon the souls of the martyrs of Kwangju and perpetrated economic plunder in the Korean Peninsula, and force the U.S. troops to totally pull out of south Korea.
 Recalling that the U.S. ambassador visited the cemetery without a notice on April 25, the statement said the visit was intended to lull the anti-U.S. sentiments growing among the south Korean people, not to sincerely honor the memory of the martyrs.
 Noting that the U.S. ambassador was resorting to every possible means to reduce south Korea to "the second Kwangju of 1980", the statement bitterly denounced his visit to the cemetery.

Brilliant Tradition of Great National Unity
articles.content:
Brilliant Tradition of Great National Unity
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- The entire Korean people are making energetic efforts to achieve the reunification of the country through the great national unity under the idea of "By our nation itself". 
 The great national unity is based on the tradition of the Association for the Restoration of Fatherland (ARF).    
 President Kim Il Sung conducted the work of establishing the anti-Japanese national united front body which would bring together all Koreans during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. He, therefore, founded the ARF on May 5, Juche 25 (1936) by embodying the idea of the great national unity in a comprehensive way.
 The formation of the ARF, the first anti-Japanese national united front body in the country, made all the classes and strata put the demand and interest common to the nation above other things and firmly unite them around it under the banner of the "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland", irrespective of the difference in idea, ism, political view, religious faith, property status and social positions. The Korean people fought against the Japanese imperialists with arms in their hands and thus achieved the liberation of the country.
 After the liberation, the President, basing himself on the rich experience in closely rallying the anti-Japanese patriotic forces around the ARF, put forward the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation for reunifying the divided country and nation.    
 Leader Kim Jong Il has formulated the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation as the three charters for national reunification and is successfully carrying forward the brilliant tradition of great national unity provided by the President, with the result that a new phase for the reunification of the country has been opened up and successes unprecedented in the north-south relations made in recent years.

articles.title: Anniversary of Association for Restoration of Fatherland Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Association for Restoration of Fatherland Marked
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A national meeting to mark the 70th anniversary of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF) was held at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.
 Attending the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Mu, Jon Pyong Ho, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Kuk Thae, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Jung Rin, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, Chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party Ryu Mi Yong, Cabinet members, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army, officials in the field of science, education, culture and arts, public health and the press, persons of merit and working people in the city.
 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in a report delivered there said that the ARF, the first anti-Japanese national united front body in Korea founded by President Kim Il Sung at the historic Donggang meeting on May 5, Juche 25 (1936), was a brilliant embodiment of his Juche-based idea of the national united front and a result of the outstanding leadership he provided for rallying broad masses of all social standings as organized forces for the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in the idea of national independence and the great national unity. 
 The foundation of the ARF made it possible to closely combine the anti-Japanese national united front movement with the anti-Japanese armed struggle in Korea, rapidly develop it in an organized and systematic way on a nationwide scale and closely rally all anti-Japanese patriotic forces around the President and secure reliable driving revolutionary forces for the liberation of the country, the reporter said, and continued:
 The noble revolutionary exploits the President performed and the traditions he established by leading the struggle of the Korean people for independence and socialism along the road of a sure victory in reliance upon the united strength of broad patriotic forces have been carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il at a new higher level, recording a brilliant chapter in the proud history of the Korean revolution.
 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's history of great Songun leadership the unity and cohesion of our revolutionary ranks have been put on a higher stage and its might has grown stronger than ever before and the DPRK has become a country based on the single-minded unity where the headquarters of the revolution and all the servicepersons and people have formed a community linked with the same destiny.
 The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad have turned out in a nationwide movement to materialize the idea of "By our nation itself," thereby bringing about a new phase of the movement for national reunification as Kim Jong Il took a bold patriotic decision and provided the historic June 15 joint declaration based on the Juche-based view on the nation and wisely led the Koreans to pool their efforts on the principle of national independence to reunify the country.    
 Underscoring the need to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, reunify the country and win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche through a dynamic struggle under the uplifted banner of Songun, the reporter said:
 We should uphold and follow Kim Jong Il with transparent idea and faith and the noble sense of comradely obligation and defend him politically and ideologically and at the cost of our lives in any adversity just as the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and ARF members remained intensely loyal to the President in the past.
 It is necessary to put spurs to the general march for Songun revolution while directing primary efforts to bolstering the People's Army and thus effect a fresh surge on all fronts of building socialism so as to make a leap forward in the drive to reach the eminence of a great prosperous powerful nation and bring about the greatest prosperity under Korean-style socialism. 
 We should conduct a dynamic patriotic movement for national reunification, peace against war and the great national unity under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and bring about a turning phase in the movement to accomplish the cause of national reunification without fail, bearing deep in mind the precious historical truth of our revolution that independence and unity serve as a treasured sword for winning a victory in the struggle to carve out the destiny of the nation, he stressed.

articles.title: Credentials of Italian Ambassador to DPRK Presented
articles.content:
Credentials of Italian Ambassador to DPRK Presented
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- Italian Ambassador E.P. to the DPRK Francesco Rausi presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
 On hand were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and a staff member of the Italian embassy.    
 After receiving the credentials the president had a conversation with the ambassador.

articles.title: Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
    Pyongyang, May 4 (KCNA) -- A press conference took place at the Russian embassy in Pyongyang on May 4 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
 Present there were media persons here.
 Staff members of the Russian embassy were also on hand.    
 Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, made a speech there.
 He pointed to the factors and significance of the victory in the war, recalling that the Soviet army and people dealt a heavy blow at the fascist German aggressors and honorably defended their country by displaying mass heroism, matchless self-sacrificing spirit and patriotism in the war.    
 Prior to the press conference, the participants looked round photos showing the struggle of the Soviet army and people against the aggressors and photos on the present life of war veterans and Russian servicepersons.
